definitions: put a new coating on or reform (a surface such as a road, a floor, or ice)

examples.text: I helped my mother to resurface the kitchen floor
the road has been closed for resurfacing

shortDefinitions: put new coating on or re-form

definitions: come back up to the surface
shortDefinitions: come back up to surface of water

examples.text: serious concerns about the welfare of animals eventually resurfaced

definitions: (of a person) come out of hiding or obscurity

examples.text: he resurfaced under a false identity in Australia

shortDefinitions: come out of hiding or obscurity
